about_the_game:
Introduction

"Anna Redux" is a female-oriented horror puzzle RPG game. In the game, you play as the female protagonist Mariannne, exploring the cruise ship in search of the only correct answer to survive.

Game Features

  • Diverse Plot Puzzles:
The game features multiple plot threads and puzzles, requiring you to search for clues in various corners of the cruise ship to solve a series of mysteries. From simple object searches to complex logical reasoning, each puzzle is closely connected to the secrets of the cruise. Solving the puzzles successfully will reveal hidden branches of the plot, leading you closer to the truth.
  • Werewolf Kill Voting:
As the plot unfolds, you will participate in the tense and thrilling werewolf kill voting phase. At each critical moment, you must vote with the other guests to determine who may be the puppet master behind the scenes. Choose wisely, as each vote could change the direction of the game, and even directly affect your survival.
  • Chat Interaction:
The game also offers a rich character interaction experience. During the exploration process, you can have conversations with other guests on the cruise ship. These conversations not only enhance your understanding of them but may also reveal key information or change your relationships. Each conversation is a potential strategic choice, and in-depth communication may lead to hidden story lines and more gameplay options.

short_description: You have been invited to a grand cruise wedding, However, as night falls, you find yourself lying in the hallway, life comes to an abrupt end. The truth lurks in the shadows of fate, And you, are the only one who can reveal it.
